wikipedia_page.main: Mary Theresa Kelly, née Coolican (1927–2017), was an English writer of crime novels. Born in London, she received an M.A. degree from University of Edinburgh in 1951. She married Dennis Charles Kelly in 1950.

response: *Mary Kelly (camogie) (born 1992), Irish camogie player in All-Ireland Senior Club Camogie Championship 2005
*Mary Kelly (politician) (born 1952), Irish Labour Party politician, Member of the 20th Seanad
*Mary Kelly (playwright) (1888–1951), British playwright, pageant maker and founder of the Village Drama Society
* Gold Dagger: Mary Kelly, The Spoilt Kill
